pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 食べすぎないように気をつけたほうがいいよ。
lessons.english: You had better be careful not to overeat.

lessons.japanese: 君は少し休んだほうがいいと思うよ。顔色が悪いから。
lessons.english: I think you'd better take a rest; you look ill.

lessons.japanese: 今日は外出しないほうがいい。
lessons.english: You'd better not go out today.

lessons.japanese: 休息をとったほうがいいよ。
lessons.english: I think you had better take a rest.
